abstract: M.L.S. changed the scoring on the goal that sent the Red Bulls to the playoffs, erasing an own goal against the Philadelphia goalkeeper and giving the goal to Dane Richards.
snippet: M.L.S. changed the scoring on the goal that sent the Red Bulls to the playoffs, erasing an own goal against the Philadelphia goalkeeper and giving the goal to Dane Richards.

headline.main: Richards Gets His 'Own' Goal, and More
